header.title: Bring the Binder
header.logoutConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to logout?

settings.title: User Settings
settings.newPassword: New Password (leave blank to keep current)
settings.currentPasswordRequired: Current password is required to change email or password
settings.deleteWarning: This action is permanent and cannot be undone.

welcome.title: Welcome to MTG Binder!
welcome.content: Let us show you around the main features of the app.

nav.collection: This is your collection. Here you can manage all the cards you own.
nav.wishlist: Keep track of the cards you want to acquire in your wishlist.
nav.explore: Explore other users' public binders and find potential trades.
nav.trade: The Trade center. Start real-time trading sessions with other users.
nav.settings: Here you can change your avatar and more. You can also replay this tutorial anytime!

collection.welcome: In the Collection page, you manage your inventory. You can see stats like total value and unique cards.
collection.addCard: Click here to add new cards to your collection manually.
collection.import: Or you can bulk import your collection from a CSV file.

wishlist.welcome: In the wishlist, you can add cards you are looking for. We will use this to find trade matches!
wishlist.search: Search through your desired cards by name or set.
wishlist.priority: Filter by priority to focus on what you need most.
wishlist.importDecklist: You can also paste a decklist to quickly add multiple cards to your wishlist.
wishlist.addCard: Manually search and add specific printings of cards you want.

explore.welcome: Explore public binders from other collectors around the world.
explore.search: Search for specific users by their display name.
explore.userCard: Click on a user to view their full trade binder. You can see their cards and values without an account!

trade.welcome: The trade center is where the magic happens. You can start or join live trading sessions.
trade.create: Create a new session to generate a unique code and QR. Share them with your trade partner!
trade.joinScan: If your partner already created a session, just scan their QR code to join instantly.
trade.joinInput: Or manually enter the 6-character session code they provided.

session.balance: This shows the value balance of the trade. It helps you ensure the trade is fair!
session.partnerOffers: These are the cards your partner has that match your wishlist. Click on them to add them to the trade.
session.chat: You can chat with your partner in real-time while you negotiate.
session.myOffers: Click here to see which of your cards match your partner's wishlist.
session.accept: Once you are happy with the selection, click Accept.
session.complete: When both users have accepted, the initiator can complete the trade to move the cards between collections!

auth.registrationFailed: Registration failed. Email may already be registered.
auth.tooManyAttempts: Too many login attempts. Please try again later.
auth.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.resetLinkSent: If a user with that email exists, a reset link has been sent.
auth.passwordResetSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully.
auth.invalidResetToken: The reset link is invalid or has expired.

trade.title: Trade
trade.tradingWith: You have an active trade session with {{name}}
trade.shareCodeOrQr: Share this code or QR with someone to start trading:

trade.joinFailed: Failed to join session. Check the code and try again.
trade.shareQrDescription: Share this QR code with anyone to let them browse your tradeable cards - no account required!
trade.waitingForAcceptance: Waiting for partner to accept your trade request.
trade.hasRequestedTrade: {{name}} has sent you a trade request!
trade.confirmCompleteBriefing: Review the trade before finalizing. This action cannot be undone.
trade.sessionAlreadyCompleted: This trade session has been completed.
trade.sessionNotFoundOrOver: Trade session not found or already finished.
trade.completedSuccess: Trade completed successfully! Cards have been moved to your collection.
trade.matchingCardsYouOffer: Matching cards you can offer ({{total}} total)
trade.matchingCardsTheyOffer: Matching cards they can offer ({{total}} total)
trade.selectionUpdateFailed: Failed to send selection. Please try again.
trade.noMatchYourCards: None of your tradeable cards match their wishlist
trade.noMatchTheirCards: None of their tradeable cards match your wishlist
trade.failedToLoadDetail: Failed to load trade session details
trade.noHistoryDescription: Your completed trade sessions will appear here
trade.removeFromWishlistMessage: The following cards you received are in your wishlist. Do you want to remove them?

csvInstructions.name: Card name (required)
csvInstructions.condition: M, NM, LP, MP, HP, DMG (default: NM)
csvInstructions.language: Language code like EN, ES, DE (default: EN)
csvInstructions.minCondition: M, NM, LP, MP, HP, DMG (optional)

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.emptyStateDescription: You'll be notified when cards on your wishlist drop below your target price
notifications.tradeCompletedMessage: The trade session {{sessionCode}} has been completed.
notifications.tradeDeletedMessage: The trade session {{sessionCode}} has been deleted by the initiator.

chat.title: Chat
chat.noMessages: No messages yet. Start the conversation!

passwordReset.subject: Reset Your Bring the Binder Password
passwordReset.requestReceived: We received a request to reset your password for your Bring the Binder account.
passwordReset.buttonSubtext: Click the button below to choose a new password. This link will expire in 1 hour.
passwordReset.ignoreNote: If you didn't request this, you can safely ignore this email.
passwordReset.linkFallback: If the button doesn't work, copy and paste this link into your browser:
passwordReset.textPart: Hi {{displayName}}, you requested a password reset. Click here to reset it: {{resetUrl}}

errors.generic: An error occurred. Please try again.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again later.
